definitions.definition: To make a false show or pretence of; to counterfeit or simulate.
definitions.example: The pupil feigned sickness on the day of his exam.

definitions.definition: To imagine; to invent; to pretend.
definitions.example: He feigned that he had gone home at the appointed time.

definitions.definition: To make an action as if doing one thing, but actually doing another, for example to trick an opponent.

definitions.example: Jessica feigned the fact that she had not done her homework.
